mainHero.title: Welcome to
mainHero.subtitle: Cactus Junk Co LLC
mainHero.description: Rent a dump trailer or let us do the hauling — fast, affordable junk removal for homes, contractors, and businesses across North Texas.

secondaryAction.href: mailto:fabiangutierrez580@gmail.com?subject=Hello I'd love to hear more about the services you offer!

items.title: Honest Pricing
items.description: We give straight forward pricing and quality service. As a small company we take pride in what we do and how we do it. Give us a call, text or email to schedule an estimate.

items.title: Don't need the extra man-power?
items.description: Cactus Junk Co. LLC offers reliable dump trailer rentals ideal for all your cleanup and hauling needs. Our trailers are perfect for jobs like demolition removal, yard maintenance, hauling landscaping materials, and transporting aggregate. With heavy-duty capacity and easy-to-use hydraulic dump beds, our trailers help you get the job done efficiently. Need help getting it to your site? Delivery is available for an additional fee.

features.title: What we offer
features.subtitle: Dependable junk removal & trailer rental services you can count on.
features.description: Whether you're clearing out a garage, getting rid of furniture, or managing a job site, Cactus Junk Co. LLC has the tools and muscle to help you clean up fast and stress-free.

items.name: General Trash Removal
items.description: Quick, clean, and reliable. From yard debris to household junk and construction waste, we haul it all so you don’t have to

items.name: Furniture Removal
items.description: Say goodbye to the heavy lifting. We remove unwanted sofas, mattresses, dressers, and more—no stairs or awkward angles are too tough.

items.name: Transportation
items.description: We move more than just junk. Need something hauled across town? We offer transport services for materials, tools, or large items.

items.name: Dumpster Trailer Rentals
items.description: DIY clean-up made easy. Rent one of our dump trailers for your own project timeline. Delivery available for an additional fee.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
